attributes.action: Resign and call a General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the way of life in this country is being eroded by this Government by ovetaxing, too many petty regulations,no adequate punishment for lawbreakers, too much policial correctness, over use of the human rights legislation, and disregard by some of our honourable members in respect of expenses and extra curricular activities

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
